title: Bridging visa B (BVB)
summary: This page provides comprehensive information about the Bridging visa B (BVB), subclass 020, which allows eligible applicants to leave and return to Australia during a defined travel period while their substantive visa application is being processed. It explains eligibility, conditions, validity, costs, application requirements, travel rights, work permissions, and how long the visa remains in effect.

structured_data.description: Allows holders to leave and return to Australia within a specified travel period while waiting for a substantive visa decision.

important_notices.notice: Applications for Bridging visa A, B, or C can no longer be made in-person or via paper form. All applications must be submitted online via ImmiAccount or the online webform.

stay.purpose: Stay lawfully in Australia until the substantive visa application is determined or judicial review proceedings are completed.
additional_rights: Leave and return to Australia within the defined travel period while the substantive visa application is being processed
Work if the visa permits, depending on conditions of current or applied-for substantive visas

processing_times.note: There are no processing times available for this visa.

must_be: A holder of a BVA or BVB
An applicant in Australia for a substantive visa that can be granted while in Australia
In Australia at the time of visa grant, if all requirements are met

application_information.apply_from: Must be in Australia when applying and when the visa is granted

travel_facility.note: A new BVB is required if the travel facility expires or is insufficient for planned travel.

additional_notes: A separate BVB application may be needed if applying for judicial review.
Conditions on a BVB cannot be changed; a BVA must be applied for to change conditions.
Bridging visas cannot be used while awaiting a citizenship decision.

comes_into_effect_when: The visa is granted if the substantive visa has ceased since applying for the BVB or if the BVB is more beneficial than the current bridging visa
visa_effect.conditions: Visa holders must comply with all conditions imposed. If holding a substantive visa at grant, they must continue following its conditions until it ceases.

allowed_to_work_if: The previous substantive visa permits work
The applied-for substantive visa permits work
restrictions: If both previous and applied-for visas have work restrictions, the BVB will not permit work
work_rights.work_condition_change: If the BVB does not permit work, the applicant must apply for a BVA and show financial hardship.

judicial_review.requirement: A new bridging visa is required to stay lawful during judicial review proceedings.
relevant_scenarios: Merits review tribunal upholds refusal and judicial review is sought

rights_with_this_visa: Stay lawfully in Australia until substantive visa decision or judicial review outcome
Leave and return to Australia within travel period

general_outcomes: Merits or judicial review is decided
Application for substantive visa, merits review, or judicial review is withdrawn
Merits review tribunal finds it has no jurisdiction
BVB or associated substantive visa is cancelled
visa_cease_conditions.checking_status: Visa holders can check remaining stay time in VEVO once notified of an outcome.

ends_35_days_after: Refusal decision or AAT decision on substantive visa application
Determination that the substantive visa application or AAT review application is invalid
Withdrawal of substantive visa application or AAT review application
ends_28_days_after: Judicial review body upholds refusal decision

ends_28_days_after_any: Notification of invalid substantive visa application
Notification of refusal of substantive visa application
Merits review tribunal upholds refusal decision
Merits review tribunal states no jurisdiction
Withdrawal of merits or judicial review application
Judicial review body upholds refusal decision

stay_longer.instructions: Must apply for a new visa to stay longer

conditions: Family can be included if they applied together for a substantive visa in Australia and are members of the family unit
Only one application form and one visa charge for the whole family
requirements: Each family member must meet BVB requirements individually
Only family members needing to travel should be included
include_family.note: Family members not travelling can remain in Australia on their current bridging visas.

obligations: Comply with conditions of the current visa
Comply with BVB conditions when it takes effect
Check conditions in grant letter or VEVO
